meanings.definition: An open, uncultivated grassland in southern Africa.
meanings.sent1: The veld stretched out endlessly, covered in tall grass.
meanings.sent2: We saw many animals grazing on the veld during our safari.
meanings.sent3: The lion thought the veld was a giant salad bowl just for him.
meanings.sent4: The veld whispered secrets of ancient times to the wind.
meanings.sent5: The golden sunlight bathed the veld in a warm glow.

meanings.definition: The grassy plains of South Africa.
meanings.sent1: Herds of zebras roamed freely across the veld.
meanings.sent2: The veld was a beautiful sight with its colorful flowers in bloom.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey played hide-and-seek in the veld.
meanings.sent4: The veld was a patchwork quilt of green and gold under the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The scent of wildflowers filled the veld with a sweet fragrance.
